description: In this talk, Brenton Simpson talks about how to bring instant-feedback magic into your favorite editor, where the key-bindings are familiar and your favorite transpilers are at your aid. Make changes to your JSX+JS Harmony+Sass-powered app and watch them cascade across every device on your desk in real-time, with no reloading...

title: React.js Conf 2015 - Tweak your page in real time
